name: Joe N. Cognito
description:
Midway project for my Intro to Game Design & Development course.

Stealth gameplay featuring no lethal ways of dispatching the enemy - you must use the tools you find to temporarily disable or otherwise manipulate robotic security units to progress.

Credits:

  • NPC behaviors, level layouts - ChipChip
  • UI implementation, general code cleanup - LightBoat (https://lightboat.itch.io/)
  • Player controls, title & options menus - Jahdiel-C (https://github.com/Jahdiel-C)
  • Art Assets: OlivF (https://github.com/unccOlivi)

A comprehensive list of the licensed assets we used (some art, all sounds) can be found in the "license" folder on download.
